image_meta.caption: ODDAR MEANCHEY PROVINCE (Cambodia), 09/12/2025.- People flee from a disputed area along a street in Oddar Meanchey province, Cambodia, 09 December 2025. According to a statement by the Thai military, the 2nd Army Area carried out what it described as responsive operations on 08 December, while the Cambodian military condemned the Thai actions and said it remains committed to a peaceful resolution, calling for international condemnation of what it described as violations of a joint declaration signed by Cambodia and Thailand on 26 October. (Camboya, Tailandia) EFE/EPA/KITH SEREY

title.rendered: Displaced Palestinians seek shelter in Gaza City ruins amid fragile ceasefire

caption.rendered: El jefe del Estado Mayor de las Fuerzas de Defensa de Israel (FDI), Eyal Zamir, afirmó que la línea amarilla dentro de la Franja ahora sería la nueva frontera de Gaza. Foto Referencial / EFE

image_meta.caption: Gaza City (-), 08/12/2025.- Internally displaced Palestinians walk among the ruins of destroyed buildings in the Al Sheikh Radwan neighborhood of Gaza City, Gaza Strip, 08 December 2025, amid a ceasefire between Israel and Hamas. Around 1.9 million people in Gaza, nearly 90 percent of the population, have been displaced since the Israel-Hamas conflict began in October 2023, according to the UN. EFE/EPA/MOHAMMED SABER

title.rendered: Fire breaks out in Jakarta building, several killed

caption.rendered: Los bomberos emplearon grúas y rompieron paredes de cristal para acelerar los trabajos de extinción y búsqueda de supervivientes. Foto EFE / EPA

image_meta.caption: JAKARTA (Indonesia), 09/12/2025.- Firefighters walk into a building as they search for victims after a fire in Jakarta, Indonesia, 09 December 2025. Central Jakarta Metro Police Chief, Senior Commissioner Susatyo Purnomo Condro, stated that at least 17 people were killed in the blaze in the capital, Jakarta. EFE/EPA/MAST IRHAM
